name: Among the Stars (itch) (Sam, BillTheGift)
description:
Among the Stars is an extremely short puzzle platformer  made for the 1BitJam. It explores the them of Astrology by giving the player special abilities based on the zodiac signs. Although we were unable to finish we are happy with the foundations this game was made on.

There are only two puzzles to get through, hit escape after that to quit.

Game Created by:

Bill Bermudez: Art and animations

Sam Morey: Programming and design

Scott Oldroyd: Music
